# embedsSemanticSegmentationMattesInPhoto

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that specifies whether to write the enabled semantic segmentation matte types captured with this photo to the photo’s file structure.

## Declaration

```swift
var embedsSemanticSegmentationMattesInPhoto: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Semantic segmentation mattes are only supported in HEIF and JPEG. The photo output ignores this property if you set [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/enabledSemanticSegmentationMatteTypes] to an empty array.

The property’s default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].



## Capturing semantic segmentation mattes

- **enabledSemanticSegmentationMatteTypes**: An array of semantic segmentation matte types that the photo render pipeline can deliver.
